text: The Sinner season two is currently streaming on Netflix now. All eight episodes dropped on Netflix this morning ( Friday, November 9 ) at 8am, so fans of the thriller series are able to binge - watch over the weekend. But unfortunately, there is no sign of Jessica Biel in The Sinner season two. Biel was nominated for a Golden Globe for best actress in a miniseries for her portrayal of Cora in season one of The Sinner.
